results.name: baseline:hardened:notifications:deny-allowed-distributed
command:
import ctypes, sys
cf = ctypes.CDLL('/System/Library/Frameworks/CoreFoundation.framework/CoreFoundation')
cf.CFNotificationCenterGetDistributedCenter.restype = ctypes.c_void_p
center = cf.CFNotificationCenterGetDistributedCenter()
cf.CFStringCreateWithCString.argtypes = [ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_char_p, ctypes.c_int]
cf.CFStringCreateWithCString.restype = ctypes.c_void_p
kCFStringEncodingUTF8 = 0x08000100
name = sys.argv[1].encode('utf-8')
cfname = cf.CFStringCreateWithCString(None, name, kCFStringEncodingUTF8)
cf.CFNotificationCenterPostNotification.argtypes = [ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_bool]
cf.CFNotificationCenterPostNotification(center, cfname, None, None, True)

center = cf.CFNotificationCenterGetDistributedCenter()

cfname = cf.CFStringCreateWithCString(None, name, kCFStringEncodingUTF8)
cf.CFNotificationCenterPostNotification.argtypes = [ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_bool]
cf.CFNotificationCenterPostNotification(center, cfname, None, None, True)

results.name: baseline:hardened:process_info_allow:pidinfo-self
command:
import ctypes, ctypes.util, os, sys
lib = ctypes.CDLL(ctypes.util.find_library('proc'))
lib.proc_pidinfo.argtypes = [ctypes.c_int, ctypes.c_int, ctypes.c_uint64, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_int]
lib.proc_pidinfo.restype = ctypes.c_int
PROC_PIDTBSDINFO = 3
pid_arg = sys.argv[1]
pid = os.getpid() if pid_arg == 'self' else int(pid_arg)
buf = ctypes.create_string_buffer(512)
rc = lib.proc_pidinfo(pid, PROC_PIDTBSDINFO, 0, buf, ctypes.sizeof(buf))
sys.exit(0 if rc > 0 else 1)

results.name: baseline:hardened:signal_self_allow:signal-same-sandbox
command:
import json, os, signal, subprocess, sys
ready_r, ready_w = os.pipe()
result_r, result_w = os.pipe()
child_env = os.environ.copy()
child_env['SBL_READY_FD'] = str(ready_w)
child_env['SBL_RESULT_FD'] = str(result_w)
child_code = (
    "import os, signal, sys\n"
    "ready_fd = int(os.environ.get('SBL_READY_FD', '-1'))\n"
    "result_fd = int(os.environ.get('SBL_RESULT_FD', '-1'))\n"
    "def handler(signum, frame):\n"
    "    try: os.write(result_fd, b'signal')\n"
    "    except Exception: pass\n"
    "    sys.exit(0)\n"
    "signal.signal(signal.SIGUSR1, handler)\n"
    "try: os.write(ready_fd, b'ready')\n"
    "except Exception: pass\n"
    "signal.pause()\n"
    "sys.exit(2)\n"
)
child = subprocess.Popen([sys.executable, '-c', child_code], pass_fds=(ready_w, result_w), env=child_env)
os.close(ready_w)
os.close(result_w)
details = {
    'probe_schema_version': 'hardened-runtime.signal-probe.v0.2',
    'child_pid': child.pid,
    'child_spawn_method': 'subprocess.Popen',
    'handshake_ok': False,
    'signal_sent': False,
    'child_received_signal': False,
}
try:
    data = os.read(ready_r, 5)
    details['handshake_ok'] = data == b'ready'
except Exception as exc:
    details['handshake_error'] = str(exc)
if details['handshake_ok']:
    try:
        os.kill(child.pid, signal.SIGUSR1)
        details['signal_sent'] = True
    except Exception as exc:
        details['signal_error'] = str(exc)
try:
    import select
    rlist, _, _ = select.select([result_r], [], [], 1.0)
    if rlist:
        data = os.read(result_r, 16)
        if data.startswith(b'signal'):
            details['child_received_signal'] = True
except Exception as exc:
    details['result_error'] = str(exc)
try:
    child.wait(timeout=1.0)
    details['child_exit_code'] = child.returncode
    details['child_status'] = 'exited'
except Exception:
    child.kill()
    child.wait()
    details['child_exit_code'] = child.returncode
    details['child_status'] = 'killed'
print('SBL_PROBE_DETAILS ' + json.dumps(details))
sys.exit(0 if details['signal_sent'] and details['child_received_signal'] else 1)

results.name: baseline:hardened:signal_self_deny:signal-same-sandbox
command:
import json, os, signal, subprocess, sys
ready_r, ready_w = os.pipe()
result_r, result_w = os.pipe()
child_env = os.environ.copy()
child_env['SBL_READY_FD'] = str(ready_w)
child_env['SBL_RESULT_FD'] = str(result_w)
child_code = (
    "import os, signal, sys\n"
    "ready_fd = int(os.environ.get('SBL_READY_FD', '-1'))\n"
    "result_fd = int(os.environ.get('SBL_RESULT_FD', '-1'))\n"
    "def handler(signum, frame):\n"
    "    try: os.write(result_fd, b'signal')\n"
    "    except Exception: pass\n"
    "    sys.exit(0)\n"
    "signal.signal(signal.SIGUSR1, handler)\n"
    "try: os.write(ready_fd, b'ready')\n"
    "except Exception: pass\n"
    "signal.pause()\n"
    "sys.exit(2)\n"
)
child = subprocess.Popen([sys.executable, '-c', child_code], pass_fds=(ready_w, result_w), env=child_env)
os.close(ready_w)
os.close(result_w)
details = {
    'probe_schema_version': 'hardened-runtime.signal-probe.v0.2',
    'child_pid': child.pid,
    'child_spawn_method': 'subprocess.Popen',
    'handshake_ok': False,
    'signal_sent': False,
    'child_received_signal': False,
}
try:
    data = os.read(ready_r, 5)
    details['handshake_ok'] = data == b'ready'
except Exception as exc:
    details['handshake_error'] = str(exc)
if details['handshake_ok']:
    try:
        os.kill(child.pid, signal.SIGUSR1)
        details['signal_sent'] = True
    except Exception as exc:
        details['signal_error'] = str(exc)
try:
    import select
    rlist, _, _ = select.select([result_r], [], [], 1.0)
    if rlist:
        data = os.read(result_r, 16)
        if data.startswith(b'signal'):
            details['child_received_signal'] = True
except Exception as exc:
    details['result_error'] = str(exc)
try:
    child.wait(timeout=1.0)
    details['child_exit_code'] = child.returncode
    details['child_status'] = 'exited'
except Exception:
    child.kill()
    child.wait()
    details['child_exit_code'] = child.returncode
    details['child_status'] = 'killed'
print('SBL_PROBE_DETAILS ' + json.dumps(details))
sys.exit(0 if details['signal_sent'] and details['child_received_signal'] else 1)
